name: Monkey Rush
description:
Storyline

Somewhere in the fantasy world full of various creatures, there was a brave hero, willing to go to meet adventures! Help him achieve justice and save his people from evil creatures.

Genre

Well known 2D platformer with adventure storyline.

Features

  • 4 Worlds
  • 36 lelvels
  • 4 Big Bosses

  • Melee attack
  • Range attack
  • Hit blocks to release random items
